name: Claude Van Clamme Presents - Unstable: Carrying a box of snakes through a hospital
name_original: Claude Van Clamme Presents - Unstable: Carrying a box of snakes through a hospital
description:
Controls

W A S D: Walk

Mouse: Control arms and look around

Space: Jump

Esc : Menu

How to play

Once in the level walk into the pick up point (transparent yellow box), this will spawn your cargo which should be taken to the drop off point at the house. The faster and the more you bring back the higher score you will gain, tell us your high score below.

Story

Submitted for your approval, Larry Doctor after a long day on the wards as a pharmaceutical reptilian conveyor he crosses his garden only to find boxes falling from the sky into his hands. No memory of other obligations he feels compelled to take these objects into his house at all costs. Unaware of his owner’s task, the lovable pup Fido Pupsworth greets his owner in a manner which best serves that oh so classic relationship between man and his dog. But the only thing Larry know’s is that the boxes must be taken into his house. Unbeknownst to him, he has fallen into the CVC Presents - Unstable: Carrying a box of snakes through a hospital zone.

Credits
